snippet: During remarks in Washington, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas also made a populist appeal, blaming Wall Street for the financial meltdown.
abstract: During remarks in Washington, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas also made a populist appeal, blaming Wall Street for the financial meltdown.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, in the course of a powerfully delivered indictment of the Obama administration on Thursday, managed to slip in a response to that Chrysler ad that ran during the Super Bowl, called "It's Halftime in America," in which Clint Eastwood extolled the recovery of the auto industry.

headline.main: Rick Perry Jokes About Chrysler's Super Bowl Ad. The Punch Line: Obama.
